thread.title: BRIEF-Craft Brew Alliance Says ‍Entered Into Contract Brewing Agreement With Anheuser-Busch Companies, An Affiliate Of Anheuser-Busch LLC​

title: BRIEF-Craft Brew Alliance Says ‍Entered Into Contract Brewing Agreement With Anheuser-Busch Companies, An Affiliate Of Anheuser-Busch LLC​
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Anheuser Busch Inbev Nv:
* CRAFT BREW ALLIANCE INC SAYS ‍ENTERED INTO CONTRACT BREWING AGREEMENT WITH ANHEUSER-BUSCH COMPANIES, AN AFFILIATE OF ANHEUSER-BUSCH, LLC - SEC FILING​
* CRAFT BREW ALLIANCE - PURSUANT TO AGREEMENT,CO WILL BREW, PACKAGE, PALLETIZE CERTAIN MALT BEVERAGE PRODUCTS OF ANHEUSER-BUSCH‘S CRAFT BREWERIES ‍​
* CRAFT BREW ALLIANCE INC - ‍UNDER TERMS OF BREWING AGREEMENT, ANHEUSER-BUSCH COMPANIES​ TO PAY CO PER BARREL FEE THAT VARIES BASED ON CERTAIN TERMS Source text: [ bit.ly/2s0AqlF ] Further company coverage:
